oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chas. T. Yenni portrait of a baby, New Orleans, Louisiana, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A portrait photograph of an unidentified baby, photographed at the Charles T. Yenni Studio in New Orleans, Louisiana. The verso includes the studio’s illustrated logo, with advertisement for “Portraits in Crayon and Pastel a Specialty, 113 Canal Street, New Orleans, La.” Forms part of the Boatright Family Photograph Collection, donated by Linda Ross Lee. 1 cabinet card.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boatright family
Charles T. Yenni Studio (New Orleans, La.)
